title: Seven Knights Idle Adventure
subTitle: Role Playing/Idle RPG
desc:
A new chapter of Seven Knights unfolds!
Meet new heroes, as well as familiar faces from other Seven Knights games, and join them on their exciting adventure!
▶ Power up when you are away!
Fight and get stronger with ease!
Auto-battle allows you to obtain EXP and Gold, even when you aren't logged in!
▶ Form your very own team of heroes!
Meet the lovable heroes of Seven Knights!
Make your team shine with unique characters!
▶ Strategic 10 vs 10 combat!
Enjoy spectacular battles featuring up to 10 characters!
Show off what your heroes can do in the field, dungeons, and arena!
▶ Look fresh with pets and costumes!
▶ Get tons of Rubies in the Big Login Event!
Rapid power up support!
Get tons of login rewards and power up your heroes quickly!
※ This app offers in-app purchases. You can disable this feature by adjusting your device’s settings.
※ By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

- Terms of Service: https://help.netmarble.com/terms/terms_of_service_en
- Privacy Policy: https://help.netmarble.com/privacy_policy/skiagb
